title: (x) Perryman Western Wear Inc. logo - ITC Bookman {Florian}
content:
Customer says “Use our logo font.”  
What font is that? Don’t know.  
Have any original artwork I could look at” No

Sheeesh!

Anyone have any ideas????

author: mikrich76

comments.content:
Hi Mike,

isn’t that [ITC Bookman](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105062606/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=ITC+Bookman), badly [squooshed](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105062606/http:/typophile.com/wiki/squooshed)?  
F
